page.title: 04SECTION 3 Foot of Ullswater
page.content: HOUSING - There are 3 farms in the area, 9 dwelling houses, of which 5 are holiday accommodation, 4 flats and approx. 25 people of various ages live there, l caravan park. ECOLOGY - The area lies within the National Park so that most of the footpaths are maintained by the wardens. The 3 principal ones are from Pooley Bridge, up and around Dunmallet to Dacre; the second through the woodland by the lakeside to come out on to the A.592 at the western side of Sec 3. The 3rd is on the south side of the river and lake. There is another footpath not maintained by the wardens from the hamlet of Soulby to Waterfoot. EMPLOYMENT - The agricultural land is used for sheep, the rearing of cows and dairying. Periodic felling takes place in the woodland. Passenger boats
